description: Four returning senior volunteers tell ST why they come back year after year.  Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: ‘I wouldn’t trade it for anything else’: Returning volunteers for the Singapore Grand Prix
title_page: ‘I wouldn’t trade it for anything else’: Returning volunteers for the Singapore Grand Prix | The Straits Times
maintext:
SINGAPORE – A monitor lizard sauntering its way onto the track in the midst of a practice session created a buzz at the 2023 Formula One Singapore Airlines Singapore Grand Prix.
In the thick of the alternative action was one of the volunteers serving as a race official, Susani Koh, who happens to be a part-time zookeeper.
